alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Mainland Dare; Northern Outer Banks; Tyrrell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:25PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dare and northeastern Tyrrell Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 724 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alligator, or 22 miles northwest of Stumpy Point, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kill Devil Hills, Stumpy Point, Manns Harbor, Nags Head, Alligator, Mashoes, Manteo, East Lake, Colington, Whalebone, Newfoundland, Buffalo City, Frying Pan Landing, Roanoke Island Festival Park, Jockeys Ridge State Park, Wright Brothers National Monument, Nags Head Fishing Pier, Avalon Pier, Wanchese and Bodie Island Lighthouse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Hatteras Island; Mainland Dare; Northern Outer Banks; Tyrrell
